verses.text: \w And|strong="H8504"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w in|strong="H4639"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* manner: Thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w twisted|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w violet|strong="H8504"\w* \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* twice dyed, diversified \w with|strong="H4908"\w* embroidery.
